luckfox-pico项目迁移到my-buildroot/vendor目录下的对应情况

project


tools
	linux/toolchain/arm-rockchip830-linux-uclibcgnueabihf ==> tools/toolchain/arm-rockchip830-linux-uclibcgnueabihf.tar.xz
	windows/DriverAssitant_v5.12.zip ==> tools/DriverAssitant_v5.12.zip
	windows/SocToolKit ==> tools/SocToolKit
	其它目录无重要内容
